settings.heroimage_paragraph_text: The digital disruptor of the print world (bold claim, but we stand by it). Built for creators who want colour, detail, and full creative freedom – without the 100-unit buy-in. Think of it as the high-res printer of the apparel game: vibrant, photo-quality artwork printed straight into fabric.

settings.content_paragraph_text: We start by applying a pre-treatment solution to the garment (super important for darker colours). This creates a smooth, ink-friendly surface that helps colours stay vibrant and crisp. It also stops designs from fading or bleeding after the first wash!

Once the pre-treatment is dry, the garment is carefully loaded into our DTG printer. It begins by laying down a white underbase (unless it's a white tee), which gives your design a bold foundation. Then, the CMYK inks are sprayed directly onto the fabric, layer by layer. Yep, just like a giant high-definition inkjet printer for apparel.

Printed items are then heat-cured in a conveyor dryer or with a heat press. This step bonds the ink to the fabric fibres, locking in the colours and ensuring your design can stand up to repeat wears and washes.
Each piece goes through a hands-on check for alignment, clarity, colour accuracy, and finish. If it doesn’t meet our standards, it doesn’t leave the garage. Simple as that.

settings.cta_heading_text: Ready to wear your work of art?
settings.cta_paragraph_text: From one-off masterpieces to limited-run collabs, we’ve helped thousands of creators and boutique brands drop bold, detailed designs that look as sharp on fabric as they do on screen. Clean gradients, soft textures, and no minimum commitment... DTG is calling your name.
